first_para: Christopher James "Chris" Evans (born 1976/1977) is a Labour Co-operative politician in the United Kingdom, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Islwyn since 2010.

full.extract: Christopher James "Chris" Evans (born 1976/1977) is a Labour Co-operative politician in the United Kingdom, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Islwyn since 2010.
full.title: Chris Evans (British politician)
